channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Commerce (Backoffice Search)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Commerce (Backoffice Search)

item.title: CVE-2021-27619|2024-08-03T21:26:10.147Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20commerce%20%28backoffice%20search%29
item.description: SAP Commerce (Backoffice Search), versions - 1808, 1811, 1905, 2005, 2011, allows a low privileged user to search for attributes which are not supposed to be displayed to them. Although the search results are masked, the user can iteratively enter one character at a time to search and determine the masked attribute value thereby leading to information disclosure.
